name: Pioneerwork
description: Zag streamlines dropshipping for retailers, facilitating swift supplier integration and transaction. Our platform enables seamless bidirectional exchange of product info, inventory, orders, returns, invoices, and payments between retailers and suppliers. With Zag, onboarding takes minutes, allowing for rapid assortment expansion without inventory risks, supported by integration with major Japanese e-commerce platforms.
one_liner: Zag streamlines dropshipping for retailers, facilitating swift supplier integration and transaction. Our platform enables seamless bidirectional exchange of product info, inventory, orders, returns, invoices, and payments between retailers and suppliers. With Zag, onboarding takes minutes, allowing for rapid assortment expansion without inventory risks, supported by integration with major Japanese e-commerce platforms.
